Header.title: Hi, I'm Florencia
Header.subtitle: Frontend Developer based in Buenos Aires, AR.

About.title: About
About.text: My name is Florencia Soto, I'm a Frontend Developer based in Buenos Aires, Argentina. I'm interested in being constantly learning, face new challenges and give my best to grow as a developer and person. Feel free to send me an email or a message on LinkedIn. Thanks for visiting!
